price: Lut nso, εberε a ͻka kyerεε ne nkorͻfoͻ no sε: “Adεn, morebɔ bra bͻne wͻ aberε a mo ani tua?
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi atatūna al-fāḥishata wa-antum tub'ṣirūna
